effect.rpgskillable.atrophy.description: Severly reduces attack speed, damage, and spell damage.
effect.rpgskillable.dexterity.descriptio: Increases attack speed by 0.15 and increases movespeed per level.
effect.rpgskillable.encumbered.descripti: Severly reduces movespeed and prevents jumping. Drains feathers.
effect.rpgskillable.endurance.descriptio: Adds regenerating endurance feathers per level
effect.rpgskillable.intelligence.descrip: Increases spell damage by 1 per level.
effect.rpgskillable.strengthened.descrip: Increases attack damage by 1 per level. Also decreases attack speed by 0.1 per level.
effect.rpgskillable.vigor.description: Increases max health by 4 per level.
overlay.default_message: You lack the skills to use this!
overlay.main_hand_message: Your right arm struggles to wield the item
overlay.off_hand_message: Your left arm struggles to wield the item
rpgskillable.tooltip.larval_tear: Resets all skills on use. Returns xp levels equal to the total amount of levels one had
